==Applies To==
* Android applications that log data. * Android applications that handle sensitive data.
==What to Do==
Do not log sensitive data.
==Why==
If sensitive data is logged, it may be recovered by an attacker if the device is lost or compromised.
==How==
To prevent logging of sensitive data:
# **Identify sensitive data.** Make a list of all sensitive information handled by your application. Some examples are: #* Passwords #* Encryption keys #* Personal information # **Identify logging code.** Find all code that uses the //Log// class. # **Review logging code.** Remove any logging code that writes sensitive data to log entries.
